titleInfo.title: Agriculture students testing draft of plow

subject.topic: Louisiana State University and Agricultural and Mechanical College. College of Agriculture

mods.abstract: On back- About 1913. Sixth from left is Monot Lanier (no hat), Ninth from left is E.P. McCollister (with hat), Holding dynamometer, and just behind mule, E.B. Doran.
